document.full_text: the new york rangers scored five goals in a devastating first period to lay the foundations for a 6-3 win over the montreal canadiens at madison square garden on friday.
document.title: rangers' first period blitz sets up 6-3 win over montreal
lines_and_colors: the new york rangers scored five goals in a devastating first period to lay the foundations for a 6-3 win over the montreal canadiens at madison square garden on friday.
